episodes.summary: Dashboard night sprint scope expanded: Morning Brief (daily command screen), Tasks (kanban+table better than Notion), Goals (progress bars with sparklines), Knowledge Graph (D3.js force graph from 678 entities), UX Polish (sidebar, transitions, shortcuts, mobile, skeletons), Morning sync. Sprint scheduled 10PM UTC Feb 10.

Otto wants 4-layer memory like Agent Zero: working (blackboard), episodic (auto-logged), semantic (knowledge graph), procedural (how-to patterns). Chose Claude sub-agents (Option C) over local models for session extraction.

Built unified memory system: unified.db (656KB) with 593 entities, 985 facts, 362 episodes, 113 procedures. Fixed schema.sql DROP TABLE bug. Installed nomic-embed-text. Created index.js CLI with search/log/recall/maintain/status/embed commands.

Memory system diagnosed as critically broken: schema.sql had DROP TABLE destroying summaries/decisions/preferences on every curator run. nomic-embed-text not installed. 2 competing extraction pipelines. memory_search silently failing (no embedding API keys).

Night shift Feb 9: 5 tasks completed. Cron audit (12 jobs healthy), investor outreach email sequence, IAM landing page copy (7 sections), 50 kindergarten leads (Partou #1 target with 764 locations), 25 Benelux VCs researched.
Otto prioritized building Kira Command Center dashboard over other tasks.
episodes.details: Wants files rendered as Notion-style pages, tables for goals/tasks, markdown rendering. Replace SSH + Notion for daily operations.

episodes.summary: Built Kira Command Center v1 on port 3847 with Express backend + dashboard frontend.
episodes.details: Features: Overview stats, PM2 service monitoring, VDR file browser, memory files, cron job list, git status. Auto-refresh via SSE. Dark theme.

episodes.summary: Otto wants OttoGen website to have dramatic ASCII animations as backgrounds, not terminal/hacker aesthetic.
episodes.details: Each section has its own ASCII animation: flowing waves, ripples, mountains, particles at 15-30% opacity. Tool names should be placeholders, not specific. Steps should resonate with real SMB pain.

episodes.summary: Built Living VDR Agent v2 with analyse/execute split and BuJo signifier support.
episodes.details: V2 scans 84 VDR files, classifies actions, detects gaps/contradictions/stale info, generates questions. First analysis: 511 actions, 154 questions, 170 gaps. Creates Question-type tasks in Notion.

episodes.summary: Configured OpenRouter with Kimi K2.5 as default sub-agent model (~30x cheaper than Opus).
episodes.details: Main session: Opus 4.6. Sub-agents: Kimi K2.5 ‚Üí Kimi K2 ‚Üí Sonnet 4.5 fallback. OpenRouter key: sk-or-v1-...

episodes.summary: Otto wants a unified web app (Kira Command Center) replacing Notion + Telegram + SSH for daily operations.
episodes.details: Tasks, VDR docs, memory graph visualization, chat, file browsing in one interface. Research concluded custom Next.js dashboard is best approach.
